text: Colette Langlade Colette Langlade (born June 20, 1956) was a member of the National Assembly of France. She represented Dordogne's 3rd constituency from 2008 to 2017,http://www.assemblee-nationale.fr/13/tribun/fiches_id/341339.asp and is a member of the Socialiste, radical, citoyen et divers gauche. ==References== Category:1956 births Category:Living people Category:Socialist Party (France) politicians Category:Women members of the National Assembly (France) Category:Deputies of the 14th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:21st-century French women politicians
title: Colette Langlade
